settings.description:
Attention: This e-bike is for riders aged 16 and up. It is not for children's use.
Note: Before using the bike with a maximum assisted speed exceeding 20 mph, it is
important to familiarize yourself with local regulations if it is legal to use in the regions,
and other requirements, e.g. age, helmet use, license, etc.
For more information, please refer to the instructions manual accompanying the e-bike.
DISCLAlMER: It is essential for riders to be aware of and adhere to local regulations
before unlocking the speed limit, Vanpowers is not responsible for any consequences
arising from failure to observe the local regulations.

settings.tab_description: City Vanture hub drive motors are powerful enough to help you climb big hills and stealthy enough to keep people from guessing whether your bike is electric or not.
Our eBikes meet the highest safety standards with UL 2849, UL 2271 (battery), FCC, IC and CA65. Ride confidently knowing every component is rigorously tested for quality and safety.
Installing an additional battery extends the City Vanture’s range from 50 miles (80 km) to 80 miles (130 km), providing ample distance for city exploration.

Belt drive systems require far less maintenance than chain drives, allowing you to ride longer and farther with minimal upkeep. Each belt lasts over 1,000 miles without the need for grease, rust prevention, or any extra steps in between.

This bike stands out with exceptional portability and easy maneuverability, making it ideal for riders of all types. At just 34.17 lbs (15.5 kg), it combines performance, comfort, and convenience without sacrificing strength or durability.

settings.tab_title: IP66 Waterproof TFT Color LCD Display
settings.tab_description: The IP66 waterproof TFT color LCD display combines durability, clarity, and real-time data in a weather-resistant design, making it essential for riders who want to stay informed and in control, no matter the conditions.

The battery is seamlessly integrated into the bike’s downtube, creating a sleek, modern look. This hidden placement offers both aesthetic and functional benefits, enhancing the bike's appearance while maintaining balance and performance.
Tektro® hydraulic disc brakes are renowned for their high-performance braking, delivering exceptional stopping power, durability, and precision.
Kenda® 700C × 28C tires provide an ideal balance of speed, durability, and comfort, making them an excellent choice for road cyclists and commuters who prioritize performance and reliability.

settings.testimonial_paragraph: The City Vanture is a sleek and lightweight electric road bike.
Ein E-Bike bringt ein neues Lebensqefuhl und kann die Mobilitat im Alltag wesentlich vereinfachen.
TUV SUD testing laboratory has all the necessary testing equipment to ensure that the frame/safety components/electrical system of City Vanture fully meets the requirements of EU GOV & MARKET.
The assembled frame is not complicated to install, and it is as fun as assembling Lego.
We've been awarded an e-bike like none l've seen so far.
The superior experience of the City Vanture's assembled frame can only be known by riding it.
Vanpowers e-bikes can also bring a smooth riding experience in harsh conditions.
Vanpowers solves all of these woes with other e-bikes and more in an industry-disrupting, fully customizable modular package.

settings.title: Lightning Fast & Free Shipping
settings.body: Enjoy fast, free shipping on all your orders, ensuring your e-bike arrives quickly and at no extra cost.

settings.title: Up To 6-Year Warranty
settings.body: Ride with confidence with our up to 6-year warranty, covering your e-bike for years of worry-free use.

settings.title: Hassle-Free After Sale
settings.body: Experience a smooth, hassle-free buying process with easy returns and dedicated customer support.
